general: Dear Aries, sudden changes in your life require you to reassess your priorities. With the Moon in Pisces influencing Uranus, Saturn, and Neptune, it is crucial to organize your affairs before it enters your sign. The entry of Mars into Aquarius expands your reach in the coming weeks. The spotlight is on you, seize this opportunity with determination. Avoid those who might hold you back, especially with the union of the Sun and Pluto inviting you to dedicate more time to those who support you. This afternoon, when Mercury activates, is the perfect time to expand your network. Enjoy a little flirtation as the evening sets in, under the romantic influence of Venus.
love: Dare to flirt and let your charm speak.
work: Assert yourself with determination to gain the approval of your colleagues.
health: Take a moment to relax and center yourself.
teaser: Seize the opportunity, the stars are with you!
